name: Beach
description:
The beach is your starting point...you feel exhausted but must find your way out of here.
<<<You can move East, West, or North from here.>>>

name: Boat Crash Site

item.name: fishing-net
item.description: A ragged fishing net. Still useful to catch fish, even though some holes exist...

item.name: knife
item.description: A rusted Bowie Knife. Still sharp enough to cause problems.

description:
The remnants of the wreckage from a boat are washed ashore...some items are thrown about. Where is everyone else?
<<<You can move West from here.>>>

name: Fishing Hole

item.name: fish
item.description: A live fish from the ocean! Perhaps a tuna of some kind? This could be useful to feed something.

item.name: safe-key
item.description: A rusty key that appears to open something. Ingen is etched on the side but faded...

description:
A whirlpool near the coast that has some settled water. You see some fish swimming around in the pool.
<<<You can go East from here.>>>

name: Jungle

item.name: paddle
item.description: An old oar that used to help boats paddle along. How did it end up in the jungle? Did someone use it to protect themselves?

description:
You enter a thick, lush jungle full of different plants and animals making a variety of sounds.
<<<You can go East or West from here.>>>

name: Village

item.name: rope
item.description: A rope that is frayed but still could be used to hold something together

item.name: wood-planks-pile
item.description: A pile of wood planks that could be used to build something useful!

description:
A bustling town of villagers who live on the island. There are many members trading, hunting, and building new houses.
They are friendly to you, since you have been deemed worthy by the Magic Totem.
<<<You can go East from here.>>>

name: Abandoned Research Facility

item.name: locked-safe
item.description: A safe that seems to have been closed for ages...I wonder what could be inside?

description:
An abandoned research facility that is overgrown with vegetation and run down. It seems this place used to
conduct some science experiments a long time ago.
<<<You can go East or West from here.>>>

name: Mountain Peak
description:
The top of the mountain on the island. You can see the ocean and all sides from this point,
so can anyone passing by...perhaps a shipping vessel!
<<<You can West from here.>>>
